Reviews.Title: Caution
Reviews.Author: R. sincock
Reviews.Content: Be careful..this is not what you think you are buying.  This title says it is 3D.  It is NOT a 3D tv!!Westinghouse UX28H1Y1 28-Inch 720p 60Hz 3D LED HDTV  ^  !  !  !

Reviews.Title: I kind of like the "TV"
Reviews.Author: Abel Mann
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these to replace two 22" bedroom TVs.The setup was OK, had to go online and get a special antenna code number before the set would pull in stations.I connected the TVs to air antenna and got 157 stations (outside antenna) here in LA.There is no manual, so you put in a CD, find your model number and print your own.I like the picture, I like the TV, and when I set up the second TV a baseball game was on and the color was beautiful.Why one star?The remote has over 20 pages of stupid instructions.Hey you want to change from CH 5 to CH 9 10 o'clock at night half asleep?Well, you just push 9 and then dot and then push Enter.If I can't find some good simple 8 dollar remotes, I will use these for monitors.The fact is, you should probably go view the TV in a store before you spend a lot of money on what you think should be basic and uncomplicated. (the remote sucks)The mute button of all things is at the top of the control, across from the power button.

Reviews.Title: Not a 3D TV !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Bhavesh Patel
Reviews.Content: It is a falls advertisement friends. This is not a 3D TV. I have ordered and returned back same day. I don't know why Amazon is keep selling this item after bringing their attentions !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
28" LED back-lit screen
100,000:1 contrast ratio
SRS TruSurround HD
2 HDMI ports and Digital TV tuner
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse UX28H1Y1 28-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
